pullRequest.title: Fix Object UFS edge case again
pullRequest.bodyText: Adding / to the keys was not a good idea.

commit.message: Fix Object UFS edge case again

nodes.bodyText: can we keep this test case? "s3a://" + BUCKET_NAME + "/test/"
I think directories are also allowed, since a few lines above, we have "s3a://" + BUCKET_NAME + "/" which is a directory.

Can we do the full matrix of test cases?
test
test/
/test
/test/

are these also possible?
""
"/"
Can we save this normalized root at the top, so both branches can re-use it?
What is an example where this will make a difference? PathUtils.normalizePath just adds a separator at the end, so does this only apply to the single string s3://bucket?
mRootKeySupplier.get() is a memoized function so don't be concerned about callng twice.
